mapper.insert: insert into comm_task ( task_no, task_type, task_subject, task_content, system_name, estimated_effort, actual_effort, assignee, severity, status, attached_id, remarks )values ( #{taskNo}, #{taskType}, #{taskSubject}, #{taskContent}, #{systemName}, #{estimatedEffort}, #{actualEffort}, #{assignee}, #{severity}, #{status}, #{attachedId}, #{remarks} )
